snippet.title: Electro Ride - Official Launch Gameplay Trailer - Steam
snippet.description:
Full Gameplay trailer all scenes’ve been recorded in game.

Electro Ride is a Soviet Bloc Arcade Racer with neon lights. From the Berlin Wall to Moscow, we bring colors to the streets! Neon lights, unique classic East Bloc cars, synthwave and beloved splitscreen. 

Buy now here!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/696150

Are you thinking you are great racer?
Get out of that Ferrari and stand for the real challenge: race with the crazy machines from the Eastern Bloc! No ABS, no traction control, no nothing. Just you and a beautiful, classic car with powerful neons. Show your driving and drifting skills in these cars! Try out 20+ cars inspired by the legends from:
- USSR
- Polish People's Republic
- Czechoslovak Socialist Republic
- People's Republic of Bulgaria
- German Democratic Republic
